snippet: The Vatican has formally recognized the International Association of Exorcists, a group of 250 priests in 30 countries who say they liberate the faithful from demons.
abstract: L'Osservatore Romano, Vatican newspaper, reports that Vatican's Congregation for Clergy has formally recognized International Assn of Exorcists, group of 250 priests in 30 countries.
lead_paragraph: The Vatican has formally recognized the International Association of Exorcists, a group of 250 priests in 30 countries who say they liberate the faithful from demons.

headline.main: The Vatican: Exorcists’ Group Is Formally Recognized
headline.print_headline: The Vatican: Exorcists’ Group Is Formally Recognized
